message.content:
1. There were participants in an experimental group.
2. These participants had their amygdala responses upregulated.
3. The upregulation of amygdala responses occurred during positive AM recall.
4. Positive AM recall was part of the experiment.

messages.content:
Statement: Participants in the experimental group upregulated their amygdala responses during positive AM recall.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
